key_risks: Economic sensitivity due to reliance on residential construction and consumer discretionary spending
Supply chain disruptions impacting material availability and logistics costs
Competitive pressures from rivals like Pentair and Fluidra
Regulatory risks related to environmental and safety compliance
Potential legal challenges and investor concerns
controversies: Proposed investor class action lawsuit alleging misrepresentation of inventory and sales practices during the COVID-19 pandemic
Barclays PLC reduced its stake in Hayward by 38% in Q3 2023, signaling potential concerns among institutional investors
environmental_issues: Compliance with environmental regulations, particularly in water treatment and energy efficiency
social_issues: Employee safety and compliance with health and safety regulations
governance_issues: Transparency and strategic growth guided by its 'Four Pillars' framework (Products, Planet, People, and Principles)
